body_html: I have not checked master or r1.5 branch. But i build tensorflow 1.4 on my ubuntu16.04 with gpu 840m geforce and conformed myself it worked. I have written all the required details step by step to build tensorflow from source with cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.05.
